item.title: CNHI
item.description: score:293 Chances: CNH Industrial has been capitalizing on agricultural engineering innovation forums, demonstrating its role in resolving industry challenges. The company’s global agriculture brands have received prestigious Good Design Awards, showcasing its commitment to excellence in design. CNH’s commitment to sustainability and community enhancement through We Care, We Share program demonstrates its dedication to societal impact.
